messages.subject: tsukas - package deal price correction
messages.msgSnippet: i can t add or multiply, it seems, tsukas available -- no cracks in wood.  they are split in half and would need re-shaping to new nakago.  i have several long
messages.messageBody:
i can't add or multiply, it seems,

tsukas available --
no cracks in wood. they are split in half and would need re-shaping
to new nakago. i have several long tsuka for tachi or katana,
several short for waks or tanto. left over pieces of tsuka-maki ito
on two. same on most. a couple with high "bumps" [my sensei says
this is very desirable.]

want to sell as package $250, for 15 tsuka, including shipping.

doug e. lewis
